common.disable-default-desc: Example: Remove default theme definitions like --text-md in Tailwind

space.title: Define Space System
space.desc: Establish an ordered visual hierarchy and information association in the interface by defining unified spacing rules.

type.title: Color Harmony
type.desc: The method used to generate the color palette

semantic.desc: Define color semantic names and color relationships (e.g.: The default brand color is the 600th color of the primary palette (bg-brand-solid), { brand: { default: { solid: "primary-600" } } })

palettes.title: Color Palettes
palettes.name: Color Name
palettes.name-desc: Example: primary, brand, success, error, etc.
palettes.base-desc: Supports any CSS color value input, but not all frameworks may support it. For example: Tailwind v3 does not support oklch
palettes.args: Color Palette Generation Algorithm Parameter Tuple

size.title: Font Size
size.semantic-desc: Semantically name font sizes. Example: footnote=12px, text=14px, title=24px, etc.

line-height.title: Line Height

auto.title: Automatically Generate Line Height Based on Font Size
auto.value-desc: Example: For a base font size of 14px and an incremental value of 4, the line heights generated will be 14px, 18px, 22px
auto.range-desc: Example: [0, 2] means based on the font size (14px) and incremental value (4), generate line heights from 14 + (4 * 0) to 14 + (4 * 2), and match the semantic names in sequence: text-xs: 14px; text-sm: 18px; text-md: 22px;

weight.title: Font Weight
